name: weave-project
description: Dual-backend RAG application with comprehensive Weave instrumentation

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd admin && npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../../agent && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd client && npm install
scripts.dev:raw: concurrently -n "admin-be,admin-fe,agent-be,agent-fe" -c "blue,cyan,green,yellow" "npm run dev:admin-backend" "npm run dev:admin-frontend" "npm run dev:agent-backend" "npm run dev:agent-frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:admin && npm run test:agent && npm run test:client
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:admin && npm run test:unit:agent
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:admin && npm run test:integration:agent
scripts.test:functional: npm run test:functional:admin && npm run test:functional:agent
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:admin && npm run test:coverage:agent
scripts.lint: npm run lint:admin && npm run lint:client
scripts.clean: npm run clean:admin && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:agent
scripts.clean:admin: cd admin && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
scripts.health: npm run health:admin && npm run health:agent
scripts.health:admin: curl -s http://localhost:3002/health | jq . || echo '❌ Admin backend not running'
scripts.health:agent: curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | jq . || echo '❌ Agent backend not running'
